definition: to fall and wither (like autumn leaves)/(fig.) drifting and homeless

zero/nought/zero sign/fractional/fragmentary/odd (of numbers)/(placed between two numbers to indicate a smaller quantity followed by a larger one)/fraction/(in mathematics) remainder (after division)/extra/to wither and fall/to wither
drifting aimlessly all over the place (idiom)
floating between zither and sword (idiom); fig. wandering aimlessly with no tenured position

sentences.english: Out of date from the combination of wandering to, shame more eastward Jun beg.
sentences.chinese: 過時自合飄零去，恥向東君更乞憐。

sentences.english: And yellow leaves of autumn which have no songs , flutter and fall there with a sign.
sentences.chinese: 秋天的落葉，它們曲子可唱，一聲嘆息，飄零在地上。

sentences.english: Broken hearts of people, how long wandering in the world?
sentences.chinese: 碎了心的人，能在人世飄零多久？

sentences.english: The flowers flutter and the streams flow.
How soon will time cover all things, and how many it has covered already.
sentences.chinese: 一切將很快隨風而逝，多少已經飄零。

sentences.english: The answer is blowin' in the wind.
sentences.chinese: 那答案，我的朋友，飄零在風中。

sentences.english: The snow was falling Christmas Eve.
sentences.chinese: 在雪花飄零的那個聖誕前夜。

sentences.english: My hands reached out, catching nothing but a rain drop, on a leaf that had withered.
sentences.chinese: 伸手所觸兮，惟一葉飄零一滴飄灑。

sentences.english: Flowers from wandering water their, a kind of acacia, two place idle sorrow.
sentences.chinese: 花自飄零水自流，一種相思，兩處閒愁。

sentences.english: Where doesnt have the life to be faded and fallen to have the youth bright color?
sentences.chinese: 沒有生命的飄零哪有青春的煥彩？

sentences.english: It made her sentimental over a leaf that the wind had blown into her room.
sentences.chinese: 這種病使她見一葉飄零隨風入室便仇恨滿懷難以自禁。

sentences.english: Falling on the catkins of the season.
sentences.chinese: 就在那個柳絮飄零的季節。

sentences.english: In the fall season, gardenia has its dance, beautiful, beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 在這飄零的季節，梔子花擁有它的舞姿，美麗，嬌豔。

sentences.english: Qiaoyue lofty heaven and earth, is blowing side of the body to send Mountain.
sentences.chinese: 喬嶽崢嶸天地中，飄零身寄衡山側。

sentences.english: Go peacefully … be courageous, rise up, go to the streets, raise our green flags to the skies.
sentences.chinese: 大膽的抵禦，走向大街，讓我們的綠旗在空中飄零。
